name: Tranquility (Husam-Aldin)
description: Tranquility is my bachelor’s degree project. The scenario of the game takes place in the middle of a forest where the player starts from their tower, the player can interact with the tower and their belongings in the tower, picking them up and examining them as they are free to do what they want. The player can walk through a peaceful forest and is able to interact with the environment, exploring is the main task to collect garbage and dispose of it, in a garbage bin to keep the forest clean.
